Title: The Rats
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Sara Lohman, Alex Kavallierou
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace and Frankie discover that in addition to having their pipes stolen they have a rat infestation. Bud has doubts whether Frankie should be allowed to babysit again. Robert's musical opens.
